ruleArticles:
<js>
json=[];
if(baseUrl.match(/ /)){
list=baseUrl.replace(/http.*?wd=\s*/,'').split(' ');
for(i in list){
href=list[i].match(/ã€(.*?)ã€‘/)[1];
text=list[i].match(/ã€Š(.*?)ã€‹/)[1];
intro=list[i].match(/â—(.*?)â—/)[1];
index=list[i].match(/^(\d+ã€\d+ã€)/)?list[i].match(/^(\d+ã€\d+ã€)/)[1]:list[i].match(/^(.*?)ã€/)[1]
json.push({text:text,src:href,intro:intro,index:index})
}
}else{
list=baseUrl.replace(/http.*?wd=/,'');
href=list.match(/ã€(.*?)ã€‘/)[1];
text=list.match(/ã€Š(.*?)ã€‹/)[1];
intro=list.match(/â—(.*?)â—/)[1];
index=list.match(/^(\d+ã€\d+ã€)/)?list.match(/^(\d+ã€\d+ã€)/):list.match(/^(.*?)ã€/)[1]
json.push({text:text,src:href,intro:intro,index:index})
}
JSON.stringify(json)</js>
